bilingual.target: 公司的利润戏剧性地增长了。

bilingual.source: In the movie, the hero's cloaks flutter dramatically.
bilingual.target: 在电影中，英雄的斗篷戏剧性地飘动。

bilingual.source: The new skyscraper dramatically changed the cityscape.
bilingual.target: 新的摩天大楼戏剧性地改变了城市风景。

bilingual.source: The magician dramatically swirled his cape before performing a trick.
bilingual.target: 魔术师在表演一个把戏前戏剧性地旋转了他的披风。

bilingual.source: The story ended dramatically with a happy ending.
bilingual.target: 故事戏剧性地以大团圆结束。

bilingual.source: He tipped his head to one side and sighed dramatically.
bilingual.target: 他把头偏向一侧，戏剧性地叹了口气。

bilingual.source: Last summer the drummer became an amateur dramatist dramatically.
bilingual.target: 去年夏天,鼓手戏剧性地变成了业余剧作家.

bilingual.source: Last summer the drummer became an amateur dramatist dramatically .
bilingual.target: 去年夏天，鼓手戏剧性地变成了业余剧作家。

bilingual.source: Technology tends to get dramatically cheaper, but living expenses don't.
bilingual.target: 技术会戏剧性地贬值，但生存价码不会。

yingyinNormal.en: I always moisturize first. Today I'm using Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我总是先做保湿工作。今天我使用的是倩碧润肤乳（小黄油）。

yingyinNormal.en: But looks can be deceiving. Beneath all the rust and grime, this place is starting to change, dramatically.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是外表是具有欺骗性的，在这锈和污垢的下面，这个地方将开始一个戏剧性的改变。

yingyinNormal.en: But In fact they didn't feel like in this way. The one when the product was free and shipping was 5 dollars was dramatically more attractive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但实际上买家的感受不尽相同，物品免费但收取5美金快递费显然更有吸引力。

yingyinNormal.en: If you can, in fact, land the rocket safely and then reuse it with a minimal amount of effort then you can dramatically reduce the cost of space transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你可以使火箭安全着陆，然后借助极小的花费重新使用它然后你就可以显著地，降低太空运输成本。

yingyinNormal.en: And doctor Pimsleur discovered how adults can learn a language dramatically faster than children through an unique audio method that literally force your brain into learning.
yingyinNormal.zh: Pimsleur博士发现，可以让大人学语言比小孩快速许多，只要成人运用一个特殊的听力教学法，刺激他们大脑学习。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The resulting settlement maps show how the distribution and density of the rural population around the city changed <highlight>dramatically</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由此产生的定居地图显示了城市周围农村人口的分布和密度是如何发生巨大变化的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It's <highlight>dramatically</highlight> changing the delivery of healthcare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它极大地改变着医疗服务的提供方式。

examination_example.sentence: This week, the Italian government passed legislation that aims to <highlight>dramatically</highlight> reduce the amount of food waste in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本周，意大利政府通过了一项法规，旨在大幅减少该国的食物浪费。

examination_example.sentence: Making smart buildings, cities and homes will <highlight>dramatically</highlight> improve our quality of life in the years ahead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建造智能建筑、城市和住宅将在未来几年显著提高我们的生活质量。

examination_example.sentence: We originally had this suspicion back in 2016, puzzled by the fact that national statistics showed calorie consumption falling <highlight>dramatically</highlight> over past decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最初在2016年就有这种怀疑，因为国家统计数据显示过去几十年卡路里消耗量大幅下降，这让我们感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: What's more, the 7,000 or so languages that exist today vary <highlight>dramatically</highlight> in how they utilize numbers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更重要的是，现存的大约7000种语言在使用数字的方式上存在着巨大的差异。

examination_example.sentence: During the second half of the 20th century, grain prices rose <highlight>dramatically</highlight> several times.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪下半叶，粮食价格大幅上涨数倍。
